backend/AltSignup.mo: Simple signup handler performing empty-field validation and returning a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with permission-checked create, read, and delete operations using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, II_URL environment config, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Declares permitted alternative origins for Internet Identity.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA redirect page sending unknown routes to index.html for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with RootLayout and routes for auth, onboarding, and feature pages.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity client and login configuration using dynamic env-based II URLs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug-only panel showing detailed auth state, timing, platform info, and stall detection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Shows an error message with optional Retry and Return-to-Landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Displays popup-blocking guidance with a Retry button and direct Internet Identity link.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Persistent banner showing current auth step, timing, outcomes, and suggested actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup progress with warming, ready, and failure states.
frontend/src/components/auth/DisplayName: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save a display name or skip.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityCon: Card showing display name and principal with options to continue or switch identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handles II authorize callbacks and routes based on onboarding status and session-initiation flags.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Wraps InternetIdentityProvider and loads dynamic II createOptions before rendering.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedHea: Header component with logout and delete-account actions that clear identity, caches, and local state.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps all routes with onboarding context and II authorization callback handling.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Task timer modal supporting start, pause, resume, cancel, and completion with internal countdown state.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Legacy unused AI config file returning a deprecated placeholder config.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context for storing onboarding answers and AI responses with localStorage hydration and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Manages user-initiated auth attempts with timestamps, correlation IDs, and sessionStorage flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks auth flow state, timing, step transitions, and slow-step detection for diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPageAutoredire: Auto-redirects authenticated users from login/signup to onboarding or main app based on profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Stub warmup hook marking readiness immediately since backend no longer requires warmup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth client, login/clear functions, and identity state via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalDisplayName.t: Handles per-principal display names and skip flags using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Provides a mobile-safe Internet Identity login hook with pre-initialized AuthClient and structured login result handling.
A patched variant of the mobile II login hook that uses shared configuration options for AuthClient and login.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Manages a password-based identity via context, including creation, persistence, restoration, and clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Implements timeout tracking for post-auth phases, exposing elapsed time, timeout state, and a reset function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps using step-specific timeouts and reports stall state and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a chocolate-themed OKLCH color palette for the application.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client placeholder that throws an error and should not be used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Defines AI proxy request/response types, validation helpers, and error handling for calling backend AI endpoints.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides localStorage key and safe JSON parse/stringify helpers for onboarding data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Fetches and displays daily tasks based on onboarding data, handling loading, errors, and a task detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Shows hardcoded chocolate inventory stats with a period selector UI.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with feature slides, hero section, and signup/login actions.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements a complex Internet Identity login flow with validation, diagnostics, error handling, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Manages the multi-step onboarding flow, collects user inputs, triggers AI plan generation, and redirects authenticated or pre-onboarded users.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Implements a complex Internet Identity signup flow with diagnostics, stalled-auth detection, and auto-redirect for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Provides a simplified backup signup page using Internet Identity and redirects to onboarding after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the user’s generated onboarding plan and redirects to onboarding if no plan data exists.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Generates or loads the weekly mountain plan based on onboarding results, caching by week and handling errors and reloads.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Utility for detailed auth-flow diagnostics including step logging, timing, correlation IDs, and slow-step warnings.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Provides helpers to validate identities by checking anonymity and delegation validity, and flags sessions as stale when identities become invalid.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from username/password pairs and handles storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects whether the user is on Chrome Android and caches platform info for performance.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts unknown AI-provided values into displayable strings and offers helpers for safe string extraction and fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/sessionReset.ts: Clears all SweetSteps-related client-side state from localStorage for logout or account deletion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Parses URL and hash parameters, persists them in sessionStorage, and provides utilities to retrieve, store, and clear them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including onboarding flow requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests related to display‑name and post‑auth logic.
